Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Data enthusiast and strategic Business Analyst with 6+ years of experience. Worked with 2 successful startup unicorns, leveraging complex data to interpret real time business insights and support impact decision making. Skilled in conducting business process modelling stakeholder management, analytical problem solving and data storytelling.

Experience.Title: BUSINESS ANALYST
Experience.Description: Managed end to end sales analytics, business metrics tracking, ensuring operational efficiency of channel consisting of 2000+ PAN India sales executives. Automated day to day reporting workflow using Python, App scripts, APIs and Power Automate, reducing the manual efforts with improved accuracy and visibility. Initiated and led sales hygiene activities, new incentive & salary framework to boost the overall productivity of the sales teams. Closely worked with under performing regions, identified and resolved their business challenges which impacted on channel revenue growth. Prepared short term and long term sales strategy involving manpower optimization, productivity enhancement, process design and alignment. Collaborated with Tech and Product teams to integrate sales KPIs, earnings, current and previous performance of sales executives into Blackbuck sales app. Engaged with sales teams, to align and tracked their adoption to new polices and products released by organization.

Experience.Title: Sr. MIS ANALYST
Experience.Description: Designed, developed and maintained sales and operations metrics trackers and dashboard to draw strategic insights for teams across the departments using data visualization tools Custodian for providing ad hoc data analysis to team members across the departments and collaborated with department managers to review the performance of team. Created monthly and weekly reports with advanced Excel and SQL (data platform), identified trends, and assessed performance to drive improvements. Collaborated with cross functional teams to gather reporting requirements and deliver customized MIS reports aligned with business objectives

Experience.Title: MIS EXECUTIVE
Experience.Description: Collected and stored organization data from multiple resources and delivered daily and weekly reports. Coordinated with vendors to track delivery statuses and resolved customer queries regarding product selection and orders. Created customized reports using google sheets and used Lead squared for tracking and managing sales leads, leading to a 20% improvement in process efficiency.

Certifications: Certified Business Analytics course from AnalytixLabs
Extracted Data.Education: Don Bosco Institute of Technology (B.E, Mechanical) July 2013 – June 2017 (Bangalore, India)

Recommendations: While the resume is well-structured, consider adding specific **quantifiable achievements** within each work experience bullet point to showcase the impact of your contributions more effectively.
Although skills are listed, try to integrate them **contextually within the work experience** section to demonstrate practical application rather than just listing them separately.
Since you worked on projects during your Business Analytics course, including them in a dedicated **'Projects' section** can help highlight practical skills and experience.
Expand upon the **'Certifications'** section by mentioning specific tools or methodologies you became proficient in, beyond just stating you understood the fundamentals.

Consider tailoring the summary or objective to align more closely with specific job descriptions you are applying for, emphasizing **relevant skills and experiences** that match the role requirements.

The resume is good about showcasing technical skills; however, consider adding more detail and examples to some of the mentioned soft skills such as **'Stakeholder Management' and 'Cross Functional Collaboration'**.
Ensure the LinkedIn profile link is accurate and active, and consider adding a link to your portfolio or **GitHub repository** if you have one to showcase your work.

RESUME_TIPS: Highlight your experience in **demand forecasting** by adding a specific project or responsibility where you successfully predicted future demand. For example, describe a time you used **historical sales data, seasonality, and marketing inputs** to accurately forecast product demand at Blackbuck, mentioning the percentage improvement in forecast accuracy.

Showcase your expertise in **inventory planning** by detailing your experience in managing **min/max levels** and **replenishment rules** for a retail environment, similar to what the job description mentions about managing inventory across stores and **FOFO franchises**. Quantify your achievements, like reducing stockouts by a certain percentage.

Elaborate on your experience with **retail analytics** and **omnichannel inventory management**. Specify how you tracked inventory across multiple channels (online and offline) and optimized stock allocation to ensure high **store fill rates**, resulting in improved customer satisfaction or sales.

Expand on your familiarity with **inventory optimization** techniques such as **ABC classification** and **EOQ**. Describe how you identified slow-moving or overstocked items and implemented strategies to reduce **aging stock**, improve **inventory turnover ratio**, and minimize losses.

Add metrics related to **forecast accuracy**, **stock out %**, and **overstock %** to your work experience at Uddan. Quantify your success in improving these KPIs, showing your direct impact on inventory health and working capital efficiency.

Include your experience with specific **inventory planning tools** or **ERP systems** such as **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, if applicable. If you don't have direct experience, consider gaining some exposure through online courses or personal projects, and then add it to your skills section.

Detail your experience in building and maintaining **dashboards** for **inventory health** and **store performance**. Specifically mention if you automated any **reporting** processes using **Power BI/Excel/SQL**, and how these dashboards were used for leadership and planning reviews.

Mention your experience with **replenishment & allocation**. Showcase how you monitored **stock movement**, initiated timely transfers from the **central warehouse**, and allocated **stock for new launches** and **high performing SKUs**.

Under your education section, explicitly mention the use of **data analysis** and **forecasting techniques** you learned from the Certified Business Analytics course. Add the course link to provide further credibility.

Emphasize your domain knowledge in **retail**, **jewelry**, **fashion retail**, **FMCG**, or **D2C brands** within your experience. Highlight your familiarity with the unique challenges and opportunities in these industries.

Demand Forecasting.COURSE_NAME: Demand Forecasting: The Foundation of Demand Driven Planning

Inventory Planning.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of inventory management, including inventory control, optimization, and replenishment strategies.
